医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加速康复计划有望减少胰腺癌术后阿片类药物的依赖通过改善医院护理途径，德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员成功地将胰腺癌手术后住院患者阿片类药物的使用量减少了 50%，并将出院时阿片类药物处方量的中位数减少到零。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Enhanced-recovery-program-shows-promise-in-reducing-opioid-reliance-after-pancreatic-cancer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Enhanced-recovery-program-shows-promise-in-reducing-opioid-reliance-after-pancreatic-cancer-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f0ecaa-9d6a-4138-8091-123e4faf73a1 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 21:00:12 -0400 Enhanced recovery program shows promise in reducing opioid reliance after pancreatic cancer surgery
病态肥胖者在减肥手术前后口腔健康状况恶化为准备减肥手术而节食的病态肥胖者以及接受手术的患者的口腔健康状况会恶化，龋齿、牙龈炎和牙周炎的发病率也会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Oral-health-worsens-in-morbidly-obese-people-before-and-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Oral-health-worsens-in-morbidly-obese-people-before-and-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd8da414-a90a-4c86-a5be-baaf62adaf19 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 20:37:39 -0400 Oral health worsens in morbidly obese people before and after bariatric surgery
皮特神经科学家在狨猴中创建了第一个遗传性阿尔茨海默病的非人类灵长类动物模型为了重新构想现有的阿尔茨海默病临床前试验，匹兹堡大学医学院的神经科学家在狨猴中创建了第一个遗传性阿尔茨海默病的非人类灵长类动物模型，概述了他们在阿尔茨海默病和痴呆症方面的方法：转化研究和临床干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Pitt-neuroscientists-create-first-non- human-primate-model-of-hereditary-Alzheimers-in-marmosets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Pitt-neuroscientists-create-first-non- human-primate-model-of-hereditary-Alzheimers-in-marmosets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac6c0ad-d14f-4e1f-89f8-fdc4d6ad6709 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 20:10:26 -0400 Pitt neuroscientists create first non-human primate model of hereditary Alzheimer's in marmosets
MD Anderson 和 Panacea 创立 Manaolana Oncology 来开发新型单克隆抗体组合德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Panacea Venture 今天宣布成立 Manaolana Oncology Inc.，这是一家新公司，旨在开发和推进针对新型癌症抗原的抗体疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/MD-Anderson-and-Panacea-create-Manaolana-Oncology-to-develop-novel-portfolio-of-monoclonal-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/MD-Anderson-and-Panacea-create-Manaolana-Oncology-to-develop-novel-portfolio-of-monoclonal-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94d58ca9-a746-4ac7-a514-39872b8993bf Wed, 06 Sep 2023 20:03:57 -0400 MD Anderson and Panacea create Manaolana Oncology to develop novel portfolio of monoclonal antibodies
即使在美国最抑郁的县，精神疾病的耻辱仍然存在早上抽烟休息时，黛布拉·奥卡特 (Debra Orcutt) 坐在长凳上与一位同事开怀大笑，当被问及她是否认识患有抑郁症的人时，她很快举起了手。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Even-in-the-most-depressed-county-in-America-stigma-around-mental-illness-persists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Even-in-the-most-depressed-county-in-America-stigma-around-mental-illness-persists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a926a362-019b-47cd-ae72-d23fbeb5e11b Wed, 06 Sep 2023 19:25:55 -0400 Even in the most depressed county in America, stigma around mental illness persists
毛绒玩具和毯子的舒适图像反驳了有关婴儿安全睡眠的信息塞缪尔·汉克是辛辛那提的一名儿科心脏病专家，但当你问他的头衔时，他接着说：“最重要的是，我是查理的父亲。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Cozy-images-of-plush-toys-and-blankets-counter-messaging-on-safe-infant-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Cozy-images-of-plush-toys-and-blankets-counter-messaging-on-safe-infant-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd9a1aec-9193-4c26-81ae-76787274550d Wed, 06 Sep 2023 19:09:39 -0400 Cozy images of plush toys and blankets counter messaging on safe infant sleep
天然产物：药物发现的下一个前沿在这个新播客中，布鲁克的 Kate Stumpo 与 Enveda 的 Pelle Simpson 讨论了天然产品在多组学领域的机遇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Natural-products-the-next-frontier-in-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Natural-products-the-next-frontier-in-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a45e04-11d5-4008-9fba-2449165eb222 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 12:38:00 -0400 Natural products: the next frontier in drug discovery
全球知名更年期专家总结更年期知识现状并倡导进一步研究在《细胞》杂志最近发表的一篇综述中，一组作者深入研究了更年期的复杂性，评估了其对健康的全球影响，并评估了当前治疗方法的有效性和安全性，强调了进一步研究的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/World-renowned-menopause-experts-summarize-the-state-of-menopause-knowledge-and-advocate-for-further-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/World-renowned-menopause-experts-summarize-the-state-of-menopause-knowledge-and-advocate-for-further-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54f637d3-96db-4a1c-8aaf-d4117d9326c7 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 11:42:00 -0400 World-renowned menopause experts summarize the state of menopause knowledge and advocate for further research
CN Bio 和 LifeNet Health LifeSciences 合作为微生理系统提供经过验证的原代人体细胞通过合作，客户可以直接访问高度特征化的肝细胞组合，以重建先进的芯片肝脏检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/CN-Bio-and-LifeNet-Health-LifeSciences-partner-to-supply-validated-primary- human-cells-for-microphysical-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/CN-Bio-and-LifeNet-Health-LifeSciences-partner-to-supply-validated-primary- human-cells-for-microphysical-systems.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2910dfa9-536d-4ee9-b388-e86d5f56d04b Wed, 06 Sep 2023 11:16:00 -0400 CN Bio and LifeNet Health LifeSciences partner to supply validated primary human cells for microphysiological systems
研究揭示了单细胞水平上的心力衰竭见解研究人员检查了心力衰竭患者循环细胞中带有体细胞突变的造血干细胞的细胞内在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Study-reveals-heart-failure-insights-at-single-cell-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Study-reveals-heart-failure-insights-at-single-cell-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c152a0c1-06a5-492a-800f-c4e46eab8578 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 10:52:00 -0400 Study reveals heart failure insights at single-cell level
